title: Virginia Tech has sights set on fourth-consecutive win on Monday - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech has sights set on fourth-consecutive win on Monday  VT hokiesports.com
description: After earning its third-consecutive win on Saturday in Pittsburgh, Pa., Virginia Tech returns to Cassell Coliseum on Monday for its second matchup with Pitt in three days. It also kicks off a four-game homestand for the Hokies, who do not have another road game until Feb. 23.
